## Attempt 1: Non Multi-Level Models

```{r}
Basic_OLS <- lm(mpg ~ wt + qsec + hp, mtcars)
Basic_OLS
```

OK it worked.

## Attempt 2: Maximum Liklihood Estimation

```{r}

Basic_ML
```
